response.job_title: Data analytics | Growth | CRM Systems Specialist |
response.summary: Industrial Engineer with knowledge and experience in the administration of optimization systems and management of information sources. Specific skills in data processing and analysis, using tools such as Python, Power BI, R and SQL. Experience in e-marketing projects, CRM models, retention budget management, design of strategies and flows that guarantee customer retention.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Análisis y estadística, User Acceptance Testing, Python, Oracle SQL Developer, Inglés

profile_positions.description:
-Owner of the analysis and monitoring of customer retention metrics. 
-Identify improvements and technological experiments of products to find ways to attract new customers. 
-Define the CRM strategy for the definition of audiences, user attributes and customer journeys in order to maximize retention.
profile_positions.title: Growth retention lead

profile_positions.description:
• Automating the email marketing campaigns required by the Growth LATAM teams
and for the different business verticals of the company, using Braze CRM system.
• Analyzing and supporting customer segmentation to improve the conversion
funnel metrics in the mailing and push channel using data analytics tools such as
power BI, SQL-snowflake and Python.
• Designing A / B testing to evaluate alternatives that guarantee improvements in
email channel metrics and sales conversion.
• Developing data analytics reports for communication channels, presenting results
with statistical evidence of the A / B tests and making recommendations that
guarantee sustainable conversion metrics in the long term.
profile_positions.title: CRM Automation Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Role oriented to the administration of Revenue Management applications with specific
tasks in the definition of business rules, application knowledge management, functional
and technical support.
• Support in decision making for the increase and optimization of ancillary revenue
(additional services) in digital channels.
• Design e-marketing strategies for the sale of web services and perform A/B testing analysis for
decision making.
• Participation in various IT projects for the development of new systems and
functionalities that are aligned with the objectives of the organization, carrying out
requirements survey activities, execution of tests and functional support.
profile_positions.title: Revenue optimization systems analyst

profile_positions.description:
Functional leader in the execution of technology projects, definition of functional
requirements, specification of epics, user stories and definition of use cases.
• Elaborate operational analysis of digital channels for the design of new solutions and
execution of user tests.
profile_positions.title: Solutions analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Define new requirements and management of SIESA- ERP products implementation
projects.
• Prepare prospective analyzes which included reporting on key indicators of software
implementation projects.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description: Document generation and management for the human talent planning and management unit, management and control of key indicators associated with the incorporation process.
profile_positions.title: Professional trainee

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Analytics for Business Intelligence

company.name: Yape
company.description:
Somos la primera y más grande app de pagos de todo el Perú; con más de 10 millones de usuarios y más de 2 millones de negocios afiliados a nivel nacional.

Junto a un gran equipo, hemos hecho historia en el país y hoy, buscamos transformarnos en el súper app, que resuelva las necesidades del día a día de nuestros yaperos.
